meanings.definition: A half or portion of something
meanings.sent1: She ate a moiety of the cake at the party.
meanings.sent2: He shared a moiety of his sandwich with his friend.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel stored a moiety of nuts for the winter.
meanings.sent4: The sun set, casting a moiety of the sky in shades of pink.
meanings.sent5: The child carefully cut a moiety of the paper to make a snowflake.

meanings.sent1: Each team received a moiety of the prize money.
meanings.sent2: The siblings divided the candy into a moiety for each.
meanings.sent3: The magician made a moiety of the rabbit disappear.
meanings.sent4: The river split the land into a moiety of green banks.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a moiety of the canvas in vibrant colors.
